Can you forge the CEO’s digital signature on this contract using RSA Low-Exponent Signature? Here’s what the hacker intercepted: 0xf886499d51e7ddd28908b2a25ecabec3543696c3a92a655ad4a77ca756ee697f73b53c6ce32d805105bd8f08faba00ea3630db549456031440ae05721e7b120

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{b03xdi4m}
ciphertext: 0xf886499d51e7ddd28908b2a25ecabec3543696c3a92a655ad4a77ca756ee697f73b53c6ce32d805105bd8f08faba00ea3630db549456031440ae05721e7b120
cipher: RSA Low-Exponent Signature
hint: What happens when you cube small numbers? Remember e=3!
necessary_info: Public Key (n, e): (6473537523546074136310460272062918041425786181866079564136119639901984351950268622245280573546790109543886970024653102576156716357184475117059131378697357, 3)
